page.title: 13Entertainment.
page.content: Medieval Weekend at Middleham. Programme of Events. Fri 26th July 8pm. 'Music from the time of Richard 111'; a concert by the York Waits in Middleham Church. Tickets Â£2. Sat 27th July 10.30am. Presentation of replica of Richard 111's standard to Middleham Castle by Richard 111 Society. 11am. Archery Competion; anyone welcome to bring their own longbow and join in. After_ noon: Knightly combat, falconry and dancing demonstrations. Sun 28th July Morning: Dancing demonstrations. 1.30 pm. Plantagenet Society procession through Middleham to the Castle. 2.30 pm. Grand Tourney. 6.15pm. Procession to Middleham Church for Solemn Even_ song at 6.30pm. Throughout both days there will be medieval music, an exhibition of spinning, weaving, leatherwork & medieval living skills.
